long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay informed and celebrate every sale with the iPing.today Chrome extension. Designed for LemonSqueezy store owners, this extension alerts you instantly with a delightful 'cha-ching' sound and browser notification whenever a new order is placed on your store. Never miss a sale again and experience the excitement of each transaction as it happens. Get notified instantly, hear the cha-ching, and celebrate each sale with the iPing.today Chrome extension.
